attributes.action: REPATRIATION PETITION. E.U. ASYLUM OR OTHER PEOPLE WHO DO NOT RESPECT THE LAW
attributes.additional_details:
OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS THERE HAS BEEN A MASSIVE INFLUX FROM MANY COUNTRY'S OUT SIDE OF BRITAIN WHO COME FROM MANY CULTURES, HOWEVER THERE HAS BEEN PEOPLE FROM COUNTRY'S WHO'S CULTURE IS NOT ACCEPTABLE IN BRITAIN AND IS CRIMINAL UNDER BRITISH LAWS, THEY HAVE STATED THEY WILL NOT INTEGRATE OR ACCEPT OUR LAWS OR CULTURE.

 WE THE PEOPLE ARE ASKING OUR GOVERNMENT TO CREATE AN ENFORCEABLE REPATRIATION LAW TO BE PUT ON THE GOVERNMENT STATUTE BOOKS  ALLOWING PEOPLE TO BE RETURNED TO THEIR HOME LANDS.
attributes.background: ANY PERSON WHO COMES INTO BRITAIN AND IGNORES THE BRITISH LAWS AND CULTURE AND WHO DOES NOT INTEND TO INTEGRATE AND SHARE OUR VALUES AND WHO INTENDS TO INCITE UNREST BETWEEN THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE SHOULD BE MADE TO BE SENT BACK TO THEIR HOME COUNTRY AGAIN

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
